item.title: Keeping cool, using a Raspberry PI to create a networked temperature sensor
item.description:
Description

Speaker: Dwight Hubbard

Want to keep things cool? Come learn how to build a networked temperature sensor using a Raspberry PI, some simple hardware, and Python.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
item.dc:creator: Dwight Hubbard

item.title: Stumbling blocks of a Python newbie
item.description:
Description

In our PyLadies study group the training resources weâ€™ve used have common stumbling blocks which can make learning difficult for the beginner. We will provide suggestions on how to overcome these challenges and to increase the success of learners.
item.dc:creator: Amy Hubbard
